author: pipermerriam
content: This is one of the area that is on the critical path for stateless ethereum but currently has nobody actively working on it to the best of my knowledge.

author: pipermerriam
content: We have a known "bad but good enough" solution of just bumping gas prices by an arbitrary amount that we determine by some inexact means. It might be a good way to start, by roughly specifying the bad solution and then iterating from there. Either way this will need some focus by a broader group because this topic could be the most contentious since it will break things.
